text: Tara namabali bai to naya, ya tomara namakarana karecha -- tomara o tomadera purbapurusara, yadera jan'ya allah kono sanada pathana ni. Tara to sudhu anumanera ebam ya tadera antara kamana kare tara'i anusarana kare. Athaca tadera prabhura kacha theke tadera kache pathanirdesa abasya'i ese geche.
